mapper.insert: insert into bu.wq_course (name, school_id, code_first, code_second, category_id) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{codeFirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeSecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update bu.wq_course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, code_first = #{codeFirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_second = #{codeSecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, school_id, code_first, code_second, category_id from bu.wq_course
